snippet: In campaign spending, Texas House Speaker Joe Straus laid out the highest amount of money ($63.67) per vote, while Steve Stockman, a republican, spent the lowest ($1.76).
lead_paragraph: In campaign spending, Texas House Speaker Joe Straus laid out the highest amount of money ($63.67) per vote, while Steve Stockman, a republican, spent the lowest ($1.76).

headline.seo: In ‘Buying’ Votes, Some Texas Candidates Do Better Than Others
headline.main: In ‘Buying’ Votes, Some Do Better Than Others
headline.print_headline: In ‘Buying’ Votes, Some Do Better Than Others
